item.title: Harden headed to Cavs: Excited to chase 1st title
item.description: The Clippers sent James Harden to the Cavaliers for Darius Garland and a second-round pick, sources told ESPN, in a trade that Harden said "both sides...

item.title: Sources: LeBron expects to finish year with Lakers
item.description: LeBron James is expected to finish out the season with the Lakers, league sources told ESPN on Tuesday.

item.title: Winfield's INT of Burrow seals NFC's Pro Bowl win
item.description: Buccaneers safety Antoine Winfield Jr. jumped a route to intercept Bengals quarterback Joe Burrow to seal the NFC's 66-52 comeback win against the AFC...

item.title: Sources: Celtics land Vucevic in trade with Bulls
